pageContext.claim: “We had to turn off our country to save millions of lives. And now we've turned it back on, and it's coming back much faster than anybody thought possible.”
pageContext.analysis: Cases were spiking across the country and states were reclosing when Trump made these remarks. Experts say Trump and U.S. political leaders issued lax and inconsistent public health measures, abetting the virus as it spread for months inside the country. The untimely reopening of businesses that Trump pushed for has been linked to a renewed surge of cases.
